overview: Director Glenn King's MeanBitch Productions presents a kinky cross-section of dominant female scenarios (and "ass-ociated" fetishes) in FemDom Ass Worship 4. Each of four scenes stars an authoritative, verbally abusive, dramatically dressed beauty exploring some wicked category of fem-dom degradation. These POV segments are immediately followed by full-on ass worship and humiliation in which the Mistress imposes her personal brand of domination upon an on-camera wimp.
title: FemDom Ass Worship 4
